comment: Slight bite but decent finish.  For the $ it is good.
A lot better than expected. Somewhat sweet, but harsh on the swallow
Good by itself or mixer, loved it with coke and with sour mixer
Old fashioned drink - sweet, Carmel taste, light burn

57.7%, Barrel 5652486, although it doesn't state Single Barrel.  Larceny is a high wheat mash Bourbon, and even at Barrel Proof the nose is mild.  A bit of heat on the finish, and lacking in flavor and complexity.  I can see why this lingers on shelves. There are much better Bourbons around this proof that cost much less, and are better.  This needs more aging.  My score was 76
Sweet with some honey heat.  I'm 3 deep so 🤷‍♂️
Love the burn in my chest.  Slight sweet flavor.   Enjoyed it neat!
Straight out if the barrel at Prop Day!
Very light mouthfeel with a light oakiness, sweetness and a sweet/spicy finish. A nice,  balanced bourbon for the value
Smooth and sweet with just a little smoke on the after taste.

Single barrel picked for the 2018 Kentucky Bourbon Affair tasted at a bottle share.

My impression was entirely favorable.  Deep, rich liquid toffee.  Good viscocity and low burn.  Wish I could find a bottle.  I'd buy it in a heartbeat
Has a nice sweetness to the finish. Smooth and easy to drink.
Spicy and hint of earthy flavor on nose.  Earthy, spicy, oaky, and leather palette with mild short finish.
Good whiskey for a wheated whiskey.  Get a little cinnamon on the nose with cinnamon and peanuts on the palate with a good little burn at the end
Love the flavor on this. Subtle sweetness on the end leaves you wanting more

Nose: Cinnamon and peaches 

Palate: Spicy.  A bit “thin” for my tastes. Not a ton of flavor.  A more experienced taster could probably pick up on flavor profile, but not this rookie.

Finish:  Burns (in a good way) to the end.  

Overall - not my choice for a daily sipper, but I’m not a huge fan of wheat whiskeys. I think this would make an excellent mixer - will try in a Manhattan soon.
Sweeter at first blush pretty smooth
Sweet smelling. Rich oily feel. Strong alcohol burn and wonderful spicy finish. Great value for the money. I highly recommend.
Great “wheated” bourbon.  Easy to drink with no harsh burn.  Smooth.
